document.heading: Tobacco Settlement Model Amendment Act of 2005

history.narrative: Law 16-30, the “Tobacco Settlement Model Amendment Act of 2005”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-289 which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 21, 2005, and July 6, 2005, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 14, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 16-139 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-30 became effective on October 18, 2005.
